price: 2. Denken de mensen dat zij met rust worden gelaten omdat zij zeggen: “Wij geloven,” en (vervolgens) niet beproefd zullen worden?
arabic: أَحَسِبَ ٱلنَّاسُ أَن يُتۡرَكُوٓاْ أَن يَقُولُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَهُمۡ لَا يُفۡتَنُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: aḥasiba al-nāsu an yut'rakū an yaqūlū āmannā wahum lā yuf'tanūna
